text: @GovernorTomWolf "How is this any different than the flu, pink eye, HIV, or any other illness that can be transmitted between people?" We have vaccines and therapies for the flu and HIV. And how many people die from pink eye? ZERO! COVID19 deaths 83K+ in 8 weeks!
